item.title: Site
item.description: This site is a combination of several tools including Hugo (static websites) Github Lots of things from the Yihui universe (blogdown, rmarkdown, etc.). I know, I know it’s RStudio. netlify (recommended by the above, but github pages works too) Make sure that the blogdown package is updated. Update Hugo if you need to. Netlify Make sure you create the appropriate github repo to deploy from. There arenâ€™t subdomains like github pages.
